headline: CEM MICROWAVE ACCELERATED REACTION SYSTEM
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment

Manufacturer CEM
Model Mars 5
Description Microwave Accelerated Reaction System
Accessories The following items are NOT included but are available from CEM:
  • Fiber Optic Temp. sensor: RTP-300 Plus -40 to 250 Deg.C
  • Pressure probe

    Included with this item are:

  • A incomplete set of HP500 plus vessels
    This set includes:
  • 7 standard load disks
  • 1 vent nut
  • 4 standard covers
  • 4 PFA liners
  • 12 Vessel sleeves
  • 12 standard frame modules
  • 1 Retaining Rings for HP-500 plus vessels
  • 1 Turntable for HP-500 Plus vessels

    All parts listed above are available from CEM
    Contact CEM for prices and availability.

    For a complete description see "Extended Description" below

Extended Description Details at HP-500 Plus vessels CEM parts .pdf
